alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 10:50AM CST until further notice by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in North Platte NE has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Nebraska... Niobrara River near Sparks affecting Cherry County. For the Niobrara River...Near Sparks...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Niobrara River near Sparks. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Smith falls campground may begin to flood as well as parking areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Monday /9:15 AM MST Monday/ the stage was 7.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near 7.8 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1100 AM CST /1000 AM MST/.
